GENERAL_HELP:
Network Bot is a bot built for the Discord Hackathon June 2019. It's built with the Discordeno library.
The bot adds some key functionalities to Discord:

‚úÖ True social network
  ‚Ä¢ üí¨ It's time to ditch Twitter and Facebook.
  ‚Ä¢ All-in-one voice and text chat social network that's free, secure, and works on both your desktop and phone.
  ‚Ä¢ Stop risking your private info with Facebook and hassling with Twitter. Simplify your life.
  ‚Ä¢ Create your social network with **.createnetwork**
  ‚Ä¢ Make posts, like posts with ‚ù§ reaction, Repost on your #wall with üîÅ reaction, Follow users with ‚ûï reaction.

‚úÖ Server template networks',
  ‚Ä¢ üåê Create a fresh copy of a server based on a template server.
  ‚Ä¢ Use one of the predefined templates. (**.createschool**)
  ‚Ä¢ Create your own custom templates. (**.savetemplate**, **.removetemplate**, **.createserver GuildID**)
We hope Discord will love the idea enough to consider us a winner and even add the feature to Discord directly.
Discord is Love! Discord is Life!
https://i.imgur.com/iYXStzo.png
